<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 222 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

Your training in the wrestling arts has made you particularly adept at moving, striking, and grappling while unencumbered. You become an expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) and gain the [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=5226) skill feat. You don’t take the –2 circumstance penalty for making a lethal attack with your nonlethal unarmed attacks. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC when resisting an opponent’s attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) you or Swallow you Whole.

<title level="2">Wrestler Dedication leads to...</title>
[Aerial Piledriver](/Feats.aspx?ID=6454), [Clinch Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=6450), [Disengaging Twist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6447), [Elbow Breaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=6448), [Form Lock](/Feats.aspx?ID=6031), [Inescapable Grasp](/Feats.aspx?ID=6456), [Running Tackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=6451), [Spinebreaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=6455), [Strangle](/Feats.aspx?ID=6452), [Submission Hold](/Feats.aspx?ID=6453), [Suplex](/Feats.aspx?ID=6449)
name: Wrestler Dedication
